body:
Job Category: Software Developer 
Location: Bucharest, Romania
Full/Part Time: Full Time 

LUXOFT Holding, Inc (NYSE:LXFT US) is a leading provider of software development services and innovative IT solutions to a global client base consisting primarily of large multinational corporations. The company develops its solutions and delivers its services from 18 dedicated delivery centers worldwide. It has over 9000 employees across 22 offices in 14 countries in North America, Mexico, Western and Eastern Europe, and Asia Pacific. Luxoft is incorporated in Tortola, British Virgin Islands, has its operating headquarters office in Zug, Switzerland and is listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

Project description:

Development of control applications and communication interfaces for Integrated Circuits Lithography machines.

Responsibilities:

New features development, functional testing, bug fixes, design documentation 
Work required on-site in Eindhoven/Holland (50% on-site, 50% in Bucharest)

What we ask for:
C# .NET, WCF, 4+ years of experience 
C is a plus 
AGILE methodology


What we offer:

-	An interesting job in one of the largest IT companies 
-	Challenging & professional work environment
-	Pleasant working atmosphere within an international team
-	Competitive salary and opportunities for professional development
-	Various in house training & webinars

For more information, please visit www.luxoft.com
title: Senior C# Developer in Holland
locations: Dimitrie pompeiu, București, Municipiul București, România
